name: Find Options Test
description: Test case for finding tradable options through agent interaction

parts.text: Find call options for Apple (AAPL) with strike prices near the current stock price.

Here are the call options for Apple (AAPL) with strike prices near the current stock price:

**AAPL Call Options:**

*

**Option Information:**
- **Strike Price:** The price at which you can buy the stock
- **Expiration Date:** When the option expires
- **Premium:** Current cost of the option per share
- **Volume:** Number of contracts traded today
- **Open Interest:** Total outstanding contracts

These are live tradable options from the Robinhood platform.
